column5: Just a reminder that in the next month or so the R.C.M.P. and C.O.s from both provinces will be setting up their annual checkstop at the weigh scale (Man. side). They check traffic going both ways and look for any infraction they can find from highway traffic act to tobacco and fish and game infractions. This can be quite an inconvenience if traffic is heavy but if everyone obeyed the laws there would be no need for it.
